name: solarkai-syntax

1.2.0.name: solarkai-syntax
1.2.0.description: A solarized theme with monokai styling.

readme:
# Solarkai Solarkai is a syntax theme for atom that uses a solarized color palette with monokai-style syntax highlighting. * Color values are from Ethan Shoonover's [Solarized](http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized) * This repo was forked from [kevinsawicki/monokai](http://github.com/kevinsawicki/monokai) to easily conserve the monokai coloring. **Solarkai in CoffeeScript** ![Solarkai in CoffeeScript] (http://i.imgur.com/0yWpW5u.jpg)
**Solarkai in Python** ![Solarkai in Python] (http://i.imgur.com/Mtf144b.jpg)

metadata.name: solarkai-syntax
metadata.description: A solarized theme with monokai styling.
